name: Galaxy Hero 2
description:
Galaxy Hero 2

Modifications:

  1. Main menu updated to match game name
    1. added background image
    2. hide Select Level button
    3. replace Instructions button with Lore button to provide context
    4. button color has also been updated
  2. Created 3 coherent levels with different challenges
  3. Enemy Updates
    1. Created a giant boss invincible enemy prefab
  4. Created new background music
    1. 4 different music tracks created - 1 for each Scene

Credits:

Game created by Alvaro Silva

Music created by Alvaro Silva using Music Maker Jam
